languages.text: "Дядя учил меня, что нужно во всем быть первым. Глядя на Вольного Торговца... теперь я в этом сомневаюсь".
"Being the first and being the best are often one and the same, so my uncle taught me. Looking at the Rogue Trader now, I am not so certain."
languages.original_text: "Дядя учил меня, что нужно во всем быть первым. Глядя на Вольного Торговца... теперь я в этом сомневаюсь".

traits.locale_text: "Being the first and being the best are often one and the same, so my uncle taught me. Looking at the Rogue Trader now, I am not so certain."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Being the first and being the best are often one and the same, so my uncle taught me. Looking at the Rogue Trader now, I am not so certain."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Being the first and being the best are often one and the same, so my uncle taught me. Looking at the Rogue Trader now, I am not so certain."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “第一往往意味着最好，我的叔叔就是这么教导我的。可现在，看看行商浪人的样子，我恐怕没那么确信了。”
languages.original_text: "Being the first and being the best are often one and the same, so my uncle taught me. Looking at the Rogue Trader now, I am not so certain."

traits.locale_text: “第一往往意味着最好，我的叔叔就是这么教导我的。可现在，看看行商浪人的样子，我恐怕没那么确信了。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Ser el primero y ser el mejor suelen ser lo mismo, según me enseñó mi tío. Viendo ahora a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, ya no estoy tan segura».
languages.original_text: "Being the first and being the best are often one and the same, so my uncle taught me. Looking at the Rogue Trader now, I am not so certain."

traits.locale_text: «Ser el primero y ser el mejor suelen ser lo mismo, según me enseñó mi tío. Viendo ahora a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, ya no estoy tan segura».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「最初であることと、最高であることは同じである。叔父は私に、そう教えてくれたわ。自由開拓者の今を見ると、それが確かなこととは言えないわね」
languages.original_text: "Being the first and being the best are often one and the same, so my uncle taught me. Looking at the Rogue Trader now, I am not so certain."

traits.locale_text: 「最初であることと、最高であることは同じである。叔父は私に、そう教えてくれたわ。自由開拓者の今を見ると、それが確かなこととは言えないわね」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Der Erste und der Beste sind oft ein- und dieselbe Person. Das hat mich mein Onkel gelehrt. Aber wenn ich mir {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} so ansehe, bin ich mir da nicht so sicher."
languages.original_text: "Being the first and being the best are often one and the same, so my uncle taught me. Looking at the Rogue Trader now, I am not so certain."

traits.locale_text: "Der Erste und der Beste sind oft ein- und dieselbe Person. Das hat mich mein Onkel gelehrt. Aber wenn ich mir {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} so ansehe, bin ich mir da nicht so sicher."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Mon oncle disait toujours qu'être premier était souvent synonyme d'être le meilleur. Mais je ne pense pas que ça s'applique dans ce cas précis... »
languages.original_text: "Being the first and being the best are often one and the same, so my uncle taught me. Looking at the Rogue Trader now, I am not so certain."

traits.locale_text: « Mon oncle disait toujours qu'être premier était souvent synonyme d'être le meilleur. Mais je ne pense pas que ça s'applique dans ce cas précis... »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Amcam hep derdi ki, 'ilk olmak ile en iyi olmak genellikle birebir aynı şeydir'. Yalnız şimdi Hür Tacir'e bakıyorum da, o kadar da emin değilim."
languages.original_text: "Being the first and being the best are often one and the same, so my uncle taught me. Looking at the Rogue Trader now, I am not so certain."

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
